synopsis.text:
As a young girl brimming with energy and optimism, Mikan Sakura finds an unlikely best friend in the reserved and intelligent Hotaru Imai. When Hotaru is whisked away to a mysterious school in Tokyo for gifted children, the heartbroken Mikan embarks on a mission to reunite with her friend. Arriving at the prestigious Alice Academy, Mikan stumbles upon a world filled with students possessing extraordinary abilities known as "Alices."

Determined to stay by Hotaru's side, Mikan enrolls in the academy and discovers her own unique Alice. As she navigates the challenges and peculiarities of her new environment, Mikan forms friendships and rivalries, all while unraveling the enigmatic secrets surrounding the school and its students.

Join Mikan on her thrilling adventure at Alice Academy, where she embraces her extraordinary abilities and learns the true meaning of friendship.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
